resources.string:
Note
Sometimes you will not get same Reward Gift as we listed because gift is totally dependent on user's current game level

 Each Reward can be used once per user otherwise you will see message like You Already received the gift from this link!.
Step 1:\nClick on TIPS or GUIDE Button. You will Find list of all latest Gift and GUIDE Links.
Step 2:\nGet the latest TIPS qnd GUIDE by clicking on each Open button of RBX GUIDE APP.
